/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The street is filled with cars and buses, indicative of the city's active transportation system. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
